participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and optimistic, loves to have fun and hang out with friends.
participant_1.background: i'm 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i have a part time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and reflective, she dreams big but feels overlooked.
participant_2.background: i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i've two grown children who never visit. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind.
